title: Bloomberg Intelligence Radio: GE Shorts; Carbon Tracks(Podcast)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Intelligence Radio: GE Shorts; Carbon Tracks(Podcast)
description:
In this week’s Bloomberg Intelligence Radio show, analysts Joel Levington and Karen Ubelhart give their takes on a GE short-seller's scathing report about the company's finances. ESG analyst Eric Kane discusses BI's proprietary decarbonization tracker, health-care analyst Jonathan Palmer talks about drug pricing trends under the Trump administration and Gina Martin Adams explains how a rare stock market event implies a unique outcome. Bloomberg Intelligence provides in-depth research and data on more than 2,000 companies and 130 industries. Hosts: Alix Steel and Paul Sweeney

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
